ModMetaData.name: [JAIL] Prison Walls and Beds (Continued)
ModMetaData.author: Derek Bickley
ModMetaData.description:
Continuation of https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2566693272 and https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2589475462 Made by: BICKLEY.
Unsubscribe from old mods to avoid issues using this one.
The Beds ucomfortable, ugly, terrifying, and tough - helps with converting ideologies
Prison Walls, Doors and Beds to complete your Prison Industrial Complex. Walls create their own room while allowing temperature to flow through. Pawns can also shoot through prison walls.
